notesStmt.note: Damp and mould damage throughout, but losses infilled. A few older repairs obscure text.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite square and semi-cursive script, with superlinear punctuation, of the 17th century.
